description: Get all import definitions from a given file.

-h.description: show this help message and exit

--top-only.description: Only identify imports that occur in before functions or classes.

--follow-links.description: Tells isort to follow symlinks that are encountered when running recursively.

--unique.description: If true, isort will only identify unique imports.

--packages.description: If true, isort will only identify the unique top level modules imported.

--modules.description: If true, isort will only identify the unique modules imported.

--attributes.description: If true, isort will only identify the unique attributes imported.

files.name: files
files.description: One or more Python source files that need their imports sorted.

notes: Use `-` as the first argument to represent stdin.
